ModMetaData.name: Faction Manager
ModMetaData.author: TGPArcher
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod to allow you to manage multiple colonies easily and expand your faction
Mod order: Order does not matter
Issues: * Unloading a map when there are hostile pawns on the map will make them flee when loading the map again * Unloading a map when there are caravans on the map will make them leave when loading the map again
License: Do what you want, but give the author credit.
